name: java primitive operator at work
description: This example shows how to create a Java primitive operator is created from scratch. Java primitive operator is different from JavaOp that you have seen earlier in a different example. Java primitive operator is a first class operator in SPL, whereas JavaOp only permits a callout to another Java operator. In addition, Java primitive operator has the advantage of keeping its name as the operator’s runtime instance name.[THIS EXAMPLE HAS A COMPANION JAVA PROJECT NAMED RSS_Reader_Primitive.]
